item.title: Solar Jet Hunter
item.description: Solar Jet Hunter View the project here. Overview Join the hunt for solar jetsâ€”enigmatic bursts of energy from our own star, the Sun! Studying solar jets, which are small and narrow ejections of solar material, may help us address some of the Sun’s mysteries. For example, solar jets could be linked to energetic particles and perturbations in the solar wind. In this project, we focus on features that are found at various sizes and locations on the Sun, which can be observed clearly in extreme ultraviolet images.
